name: Polar War
description:
Polar War

You are the world's smartest Polar Bear. You have created a weather machine that will reverse Global Warming...by freezing the Earth. The humans do not like that, and are trying to shut you down. STOP THEM!

Goal of the Game:

Keep the enemy from destroying your device by shooting any enemies that approach!

No Mercy!


Controls:

WASD to move the character.

Use the mouse to aim.

Left Click to Shoot.

I realize that is a bare bones game in terms of content. This game was mostly for my own education on working in a 3D environment in Unity. Given more time, I would
definitely flesh it out with:

  • More Enemy Types
  • More complex Level Design
  • Increasing Difficulty
  • Better Targeting
  • Structuring the game so that the Player moves around the map more
  • Overall Artwork
  • Music and Sound Effects

For now,  I'd like to present my efforts, and I hope you enjoy my game!

If you encounter any bugs within the game, please let me know.

Thanks for your interest! Have Fun!
